attributes.action: We call on the Government to scrap HS2.
attributes.additional_details:
For more info and evidence please visit www.stophs2.org and Stop HS2 on Facebook
https://www.facebook.com/STOP.HS2/
attributes.background:
We believe: 
the taxpayers money could be spent on other more worthwhile projects such as  the existing rail networks.
That the damage to our countryside and woodland is not acceptable.
That the proposed benefits of HS2 are very questionable and the project could be a huge waste of money.
